Text: It's some serious good stuff you've been uploading, data 9724. I'm just passing by to thank you for your good taste and will to share this material because most americans don't know european comics. I'm having a blast reading Guilty Pleasures and Clara After Dark. I've always been a fan of Jordi Bernet but never heard about this series. Thanks, again and keep up the good work! Excelsior!

You're welcome.
The 4th (and last) Guilty Pleasures book will come eventually, I just need to finish translating Valhalla 15 before I get time to do scan of Guilty Pleasures so Alice can get something to translate and retext on :).
I don't know who Alice is but tell her a big thank you from me, and I'm sure, from a bunch of other people.
Thank you for sharing this! Also thanks alot to your friend for translating it! :)

Many thanks to you and Alice, data9774. 

The quality of the scans and the translation is outstanding!
